title: SMC Authorization Policy Schema
description: Defines the global governance rules and required thresholds for state transitions in the Sovereign AGI core.

minimum_signature_threshold.description: The minimum number of valid, required role signatures necessary to authorize a non-exempt transition.

required_roles.description: List of high-level roles whose signatures are considered valid toward meeting the governance threshold (e.g., 'Core_Maintainer', 'Security_Auditor').

exempt_transitions.description: List of state transitions that are exempt from the global signature threshold requirement (e.g., 'Error -> Panic', 'Init -> Idle'). Format: 'STATE_A -> STATE_B'.
